justification: Participants were screened on the basis of dimensional psychopathology scores: Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ-9) ≥ 10.

measured_by: Overall Anxiety Severity and Impairment Scale (OASIS)
justification: Screening criteria included an Overall Anxiety Severity and Impairment Scale (OASIS) score ≥ 8.
Participants were included if they had a Drug Abuse Screening Test (DAST-10) score > 3.
Participants were grouped based on DSM-IV or DSM-5 diagnosis using the Mini International Neuropsychiatric Inventory (MINI).

measured_by: Wide Range Achievement Test Reading score (WRAT)
justification: WRAT scores were used to ensure differences in task behavior were not only due to differences in general intelligence.

measured_by: Prior policy precision parameter β (active-inference model)
justification: We estimated a prior policy precision parameter (β) which acts as an index of an individual's decision uncertainty during the task.
The relative value of the negative affective stimulus was estimated as the 'emotional conflict' (EC) parameter, reflecting expected aversiveness of stimuli relative to reward.
